name: The Hampo Collection
description:
This is a couple of minigames featuring a 3D Hamster modelled by my tutor. 

This is a project that I work on when I have time and hasn't been worked on for a little while. I am planning to update the code to include any applicable new knowledge I have gained.

All minigames are 2 player. More minigames will be added when time allows it.

Enjoy!
